com.github.dandelion.core.asset.web

Class AssetsRequestContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.dandelion.core.asset.web.AssetsRequestContext

  • public class AssetsRequestContext
extends Object
    Request Context to stock all needed assets by scopes during page processing
